channel.title: Showui on A Sysadmin, An SRE, and a DevOps Walk Into a Bar

item.title: Resources for the WI .NET User Group
item.description: I’ll get the slides posted sometime (in the middle of migrating my machine to the developer preview of Win 8), but the links I mentioned are: —Project Home - http://www.show-ui.com —CodeplexSite - http://showui.codeplex.com —Doug Finke’s Blog - http://dougfinke.com/blog —Joel “Jaykul” Bennet’sBlog - http://huddledmasses.org —James Brundage’sBlog - http://blog.start-automating.com/
